title: C# License Header Update Complete
details:
Successfully updated all C# files in the project to use the new simple MIT license header format. 

RESULTS:
- 152 C# files processed
- All files updated with new header: "// Licensed under the MIT License. See LICENSE file in the project root for full license information."
- Previous complex copyright headers removed
- Script scripts/add-file-headers.ps1 updated and working correctly
- VS Code snippets in .vscode/csharp-header-snippets.json updated
- All files now have consistent, simple header format

HEADER FORMAT:
```csharp
// Licensed under the MIT License. See LICENSE file in the project root for full license information.
```

The header standardization is now complete and future files will automatically use this format.
